name: RONIN RUN
description:
[ WINDOWS ] -MOVEMENT - <A   and   D >

[ Story Plot ]

Once upon a time, there was a young boy who had a dream. He wanted to be a Ronin, as such he ran in order to become a Ronin. He ran and ran and still running, forever in this endless loop of a dimension. 

The game itself will be an "endless runner" game where the game will keep running to accumulate distance and points. When hit by an obstacle, the player loses and has to start collecting points again from the beginning. The game is easy to understand and can be played repeatedly 

[Concept Game] 

The character is design to be similar to a samurai, and the game will have a sense of Japanese to it. 

P.S. If you have tried playing, what is your highest score? Share them below in the comments section.
